Gordon, will that be a NBTHK publication, or like the last book you 
translated that was sold through Harry Watson and the JSSUS ?, or is 
this for the NTHK ?

Just curious how it will be made available.

Rich

Gordon Robson wrote:
>
> Thanks, but let's not get started on kodogu -- it's a nightmare. I am
> presently translating a piece by Fukushi sensei on the Higo Hirata School.
> There is only one known signed piece and probably three generations of
> Hirata Hikozo. However, in the article Fukushi sensei admits that he 
> cannot
> tell the difference from one generation to the next and so lumps 
> everything
> together as first generation. And, this is the easy stuff.
>
> Gordon
>
>
